content.rendered:
Exam Rocket

AppSquadz is glad to announce the successful launch of another prolific mobile application titled – “Exam Rocket”. It is now available on Google Play Store. Exam Rocket is an online learning program for students to prepare for competitive exams such as Bank PO, SSC and many more. This app helps students learn, test and analyze their performance and knowledge. The objective of this app was to provide a platform that can help candidates prepare better for exams. And, our developer has left no stone unturned to make the app engaging and intuitive.

The interactive and intuitive format of Exam Rocket App has made preparation for exams more fun and interesting. The application significantly helps candidates to have better retention of key concepts. This Android mobile application comprises all the required tools and tackles for candidates to showcase the best of their potential.

The Exam Rocket app platform is crafted in such a way that it enables students to take online exams, have a feedback and get constructive solutions for errors (if any). As the time of old a video or lecture-based learning approach has gone. And to adapt to modern approach, the commencement of Exam Rocket application has taken place. This app is based upon the “active learning” principle. One of the USPs of this app comprises quick feedback one each and every action. Every five to ten minutes lesson builds on previously-learned concepts the knowledge and understanding of the candidates are tested persistently while introducing to new concepts.

Highlights of Exam Rocket Application

  • Exam Rocket app offers unlimited questions to practice. These are especially created by our professionals.
  • It also provides quick feedbacks and solutions for all sorts’ problems.
  • A candidate is rewarded by scores for each correct answer.
  • Bonus points are also given when a candidate give correct answers quickly.
  • It also offers opportunities to beat your earlier High Score with a new High Score.
  • Multiple Levels are designed for reaching new milestones.
  • Analytics are also provided through the app to analyze strong and weak areas.
  • A candidate can follow friends and see what everyone is up to.
  • Rankings among friends are provided for each course.
  • Rankings can also be seen worldwide.

NOTE – For now, Exam Rocket app includes PO and SSC course and other courses will be coming soon.
